Package com.group12.helper

Class GameHelper

java.lang.Object
com.group12.helper.GameHelper
public class GameHelper extends Object
The GameHelper class is responsible for having helper methods about game logic and setting up the board for offline (against CPU) games.

    • gatherNewResourcesPlayer

      public static void gatherNewResourcesPlayer(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane anchorPane, List<javafx.scene.text.Text> tileTextList, List<String> ownedCircles, int diceResult)
      A method to gather resources for the player.
      Parameters:
      anchorPane - - Main game board section of the scene.
      tileTextList - - List of hexagonal tiles.
      ownedCircles - - Already owned settlements by the player.
      diceResult - - Sum of dice results.

    • gatherNewResourcesCPU

      public static void gatherNewResourcesCPU(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane anchorPane, CPUPlayer cpuPlayer, List<javafx.scene.text.Text> tileTextList, List<String> ownedCircles, int diceResult)
      A method to gather resources for the cpu player.
      Parameters:
      anchorPane - - Main game board section of the scene.
      cpuPlayer - - CPUPlayer instance that will gather resources.
      tileTextList - - List of hexagonal tiles.
      ownedCircles - - Already owned settlements by the cpu player.
      diceResult - - Sum of dice results.

      Parameters:
      anchorPane - - Main game board section of the scene.
      ownedCircles - - Already owned settlements by the player.
      firstDiceImage - - ImageView of the first dice.
      secondDiceImage - - ImageView of the second dice.

      Returns:
      - Dice result as an integer.
